channel.title: dealing with on Workerpedia
channel.description: Recent content in dealing with on Workerpedia

item.title: Why don't Black people just not commit crimes and be polite and follow orders when dealing with cops? Always seems to work for me.
item.description: Maybe you not having to deal with trouble from cops has less to do with being “polite” and “following orders,” and more to do with not being Black. Either way, your rationale is purely anecdotal.
